title: Origins of the Wharf Rat

embed.description: As the dust settles from the explosive conclusion to the events in Bilgewater, let's take a look back at a horrifying little critter who just wants to be loved: The Wharf Rat. Butcher's Bridge introduced this brainchild of a few disturbed individuals, who are here to demystify the shark/rat hybrids.

body: Considering it's technically lore I figured I'd put it here to people get a taste of how terrifying Wharf Rats truly are. They may look cute but watch out; they'll bite yer sodding legs off.

replies.body:
...I don't like them.

I've met other Rioters who have said they're far cuter than poros and I just go cross-eyed with disbelief.  They give me the same feeling as when you see furbies that have had their fabric removed.  * <shudder> *
...you are third rioter im commenting in the hopes of finding a rioter to play with for my 1000th win TT

> [{quoted}](name=dr lichdeath,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tEG0fUET,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2015-08-15T17:32:42.506+0000)
>
> ...you are third rioter im commenting in the hopes of finding a rioter to play with for my 1000th win TT

I would, but two problems - I've not got an EUW account, and secondly (and more importantly) you're Gold and I'm not even Bronze (unranked).  
It would be unlikely to be your 1000th *win*, if you see what I mean :(

I've looked at your thread, and I've sent a word around to see if there's anyone available (but being the weekend, it's harder to find people).  I do want to clarify - playing a game with a Rioter is not a promise for 1000 wins.  It's something fun that some Rioters try to get involved with, but it's not something we can guarantee happens every time.  There's a whole lot of you guys, and a much smaller number of Rioters.

(In other news - bloody incredible effort, getting to 1000 wins!  Congrats!   You have my admiration, if not my bad-teammate-playingness.)

oh i see thx for the reply 
thought it was a promise but ye it might not be that feasible if u think about it xD
but i just wanna play with a rioter for once seems like a thing i want to do once
I like them more than Poros because they're god damn Wharf Rats. Savage? Check. Cool looking? Check? Potentially reptilian somehow? Check.
But they _are_ far cuter than poros!

We need Razorfin Twitch.

Imagine the jumpscares >:)))))

If the actual wharf rats are razorfins in game... how exactly did bilgewater survive?

And if that question has an answer, CAN WE HAVE THOSE PEOPLE/THINGS AS CHAMPIONS?!
glad I'm not the only one that think they're kind of cute
now how do these bilge-lions look?????
I'd like to assume they're saber-toothed sea lions the size of cows.

Why weren't we told this in the actual event is my question. I like the concepts and art and such, but to have it told to us through a Riot post rather than in story form or journal entries etc. is a bit sad to me.
